description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe file for BusyBox, specifying its configuration, dependencies, installation procedures, and support scripts within an OpenEmbedded/Yocto build environment. It contains metadata, dependency declarations, configuration functions, and install scripts for BusyBox customization and integration.

classes.name: busybox
classes.description: A meta-information and configuration include file for building BusyBox within the Yocto Project framework. Defines dependencies, configuration functions, and install procedures for BusyBox.

methods.name: busybox_cfg
methods.description: Helper function to set or unset BusyBox configuration options based on features.

methods.name: features_to_busybox_settings
methods.description: Maps distro features to BusyBox build configuration snippets.

methods.name: features_to_busybox_conf
methods.description: Returns configuration lines based on current distro features.

methods.name: features_to_busybox_del
methods.description: Returns configuration lines to be removed based on current distro features.

methods.name: do_prepare_config
methods.description: Prepares the BusyBox configuration, adjusting Netowrk and feature options, generating the .config file.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures BusyBox by preparing the config and merging config fragments, called during build.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compiles BusyBox, handling split suid configuration if enabled.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs BusyBox binaries, links, and configuration files into the target image, handling various build options and features.

methods.name: do_install_ptest
methods.description: Installs testing infrastructure for BusyBox including test suite copying and symlink creation.

methods.name: pkg_postinst:${PN}:prepend
methods.description: Prepends post-installation script to set symlinks and ensure consistent environment after installation.

methods.name: pkg_postinst:${PN}:append
methods.description: Appends post-install code to handle cleanup and final setup tasks after BusyBox installation.

methods.name: pkg_prerm:${PN}
methods.description: Pre-removal script that cleans up symlinks and prepares system for BusyBox removal.

methods.name: pkg_prerm:${PN}-syslog
methods.description: Removes syslog service during pre-removal phase.
